column5: Spacious and open floor plan with tile floors throughout! Three bedrooms, plus study. Large living area with stone fireplace. The kitchen features granite countertops, island, walk-in pantry, upgraded cabinets and dining area. The private master suite has a luxurious master bath with jetted tub, two sinks and walk-in closet. Oversized 2 car garage, great for storage. You will enjoy the screened in patio while overlooking the hilltop views of the greenbelt below.
